scripts.install-pkgs: npm run install-server && npm run install-client && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test --prefix server && npm run test --prefix client
scripts.watch: concurrently "npm run watch --prefix server" "npm start --prefix client"
scripts.deploy: npm run build --prefix client && npm run start --prefix server
scripts.deploy-cluster: npm run build --prefix client && npm run cluster --prefix server
